prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that floats silently in the night.
I want to see a small, spooky Pokemon with a haunting smile.
Generate an ethereal Pokemon with wispy features and glowing eyes.
Make a playful ghost Pokemon that loves to scare unsuspecting trainers.
Imagine a shadowy creature that lurks in abandoned places.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of mischief and playfulness.
Show me a mysterious ghost Pokemon that brings an eerie vibe.

distinctive_features: Pointed top resembling a ghostly hood
